      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        SHOULD randomly shuffle this. Such that the Cards stored by this would not appear in the same order as another Cardset after the sort() method is called on the other. Set logic: Cardset.shuffle() != Cardset.sort()

        This method SHOULD NOT shuffle the same pattern on each call. (e.x. SHOULD NOT always swap index 1 and 17). While there can be a possibility that two Cardsets result in the same order after this method, the chance should be unlikely. Set logic: Cardset.shuffle() != Cardset.shuffle()

        Specified by:
        shuffle in interface ICardset<Card>

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Should sort this in a consistent manner.

        Any number of calls to this method on the same Deck should produce the same ordering of Cards stored internally. Set logic: Cardset.sort() == Cardset.sort()

        Specified by:
        sort in interface ICardset<Card>
